Service Design

At Zipcar IÂ led the development of the member experience for the first new service offering in company history. ONEWAY has shifted the paradigm of the service and is forming the basis for the future of their carsharing network. I considered all aspects of our service to inform the best possible point-to-point carsharing journey including user experience, education, communications, pricing, and policies.

Much of what I worked on remains confidential as development is ongoing.
